description:
While attending comiket, the group coincidentally happens on a young man, Mikagami, who turns out to be a fashion model and designer that Kirino knew from work. As the two of them start enjoying a friendly otaku conversation, Kyousuke finds himself wondering about their relationship. Then Kirino comes forth and confesses the shocking truth to him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma petite sœur n`est pas censée amener son petit ami à la maison
Ore no Imouto ga Ie ni Kareshi o Tsuretekuru Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Sister Would Bring Her Boyfriend Home!
俺の妹が家に彼氏をつれてくるわけがない
